info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 13 at 9:28PM EDT until July 14 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EDT /3 AM CDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Waves of 3 to 5 feet will subside 1 to 3 feet overnight. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte county. In Michigan, Berrien county. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EDT /3 AM CDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
